name: Lil Guy Big Adventure
description:
Play as “Lil Guy”- a hero who knocks sense into monsters and travels the land in search of new creatures and environments. 

Gameplay revolves around entering an area and defeating monsters – attempt to befriend them and add them to your party before moving onto the next zone!

Some boss monsters may not be as friendly as your teammates, plan your winning strategy and overcome the challenge!
